recommended_degree: Teknik Sipil, Konstruksi Sipil, Pendidikan Teknik Bangunan, Teknik Infrastruktur Sipil dan Perancangan Arsitektur, Konstruksi Gedung (Sarjana)
job_description:
•	Assist with daily on-site activities within the civil engineering scope under the supervision of senior engineers.
•	Support the Project Manager and engineering team in carrying out basic project coordination and administrative tasks.
•	Help liaise with subcontractors, vendors, and internal teams to gather information and support the resolution of minor on-site technical issues.
•	Assist in monitoring construction progress, quality checks, and safety compliance through guided site observations.
•	Participate in technical reviews, inspections, and preparation of simple reports or documentation.
•	Support the implementation of construction plans, design adjustments, and engineering solutions as assigned by supervisors.
